code: import{Button}from"@chakra-ui/react";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Palindrome(props){function handleclick(){if(props.input===""){props.ispalindrome("error");}else{var len=props.input.length;for(var i=0;i<len/2;i++){if(props.input[i]!==props.input[len-1-i]){return props.ispalindrome(false);}}return props.ispalindrome(true);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleclick,mb:"5px",colorScheme:"teal",variant:"outline",children:"Palindrome String"});}export default Palindrome;
